tool.name: netChainSubset
tool.description: Create chain file with subset of chains that appear in the net

param.label: Split on insert
param.help: Split chain when get an insertion of another chain.

param.label: Whole chains
param.help: Write entire chain references by net, don't split when a high-level net is encoundered. This is useful when nets have been filtered.

param.label: Skip missing chains
param.help: Skip chains that are not found instead of generating an error. Useful if chains have been filtered.

tool.help:
**What it does**
`netChainSubset`_ is a tool to Create chain file with subset of chains that appear in the net
For implementation details see netChainSubset's `source code`_.
